About

Welcome the code node!

May 23, 2018

You’ll find mentions to various projects here.

Check out the dyn-text for a little web component that turns a list of words or phrases into an inline slideshow. Now you can easily say the same thing a few ways and use the same text footprint.

Feedify lets you throw things into a directory and have them turned into an iTunes compatible podcast/rss feed.

Shared Hosting Dynamic DNS is a project to give all the tools and instructions on getting up your own dynamic dns service so you can access machines from anywhere that are behind a dynamic IP address. No need for a premium service when you can easily make your own.
